title: Chicago Bears Top Ten Playoff Wins of Super Bowl Era: 3. Bears declare Marshall law against Rams

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Chicago Bears Top Ten Playoff Wins of Super Bowl Era: 3. Bears declare Marshall law against Rams
sources.description: The Chicago Bears 24-0 blowout of the LA Rams in the 1985 NFC Championship game comes in 3rd on our top 10 playoff victories of the Super Bowl era. Wilber Marshall woudl approve.
